name: Brave New World
description: This is an exercise I had to do for the subject Game Mechanics III. In this exercise we had to create a game with a concept restriction that it was made by a random game concept generator. Mine was ''Tycoon where you have to fix resources to dominate the market'', so I made a city that you had to fix the buildings in order to make the best score posible as accumulating as much consumption and population as you could.
